message.content:
cs.IR, cs.LG, cs.CV, cs.CL, cs.MM. 

The paper deals with personalized rating prediction in recommender systems, which is a common problem in information retrieval (cs.IR) and machine learning (cs.LG). The authors propose a multi-modal aspect-aware topic model (MATM) to model users' preferences and items' features from different aspects, which involves natural language processing (NLP) and computer vision (CV) techniques. Therefore, the paper may also belong to the sub-categories of computer vision (cs.CV), natural language processing (cs.CL), and multimedia (cs.MM).
